name: Charlie's Angels
synopsis: Join Natalie, Dylan, and Alex for an intense adventure based on the Charlie's Angels movies. You'll need various disguises, clever tactics, and acrobatic martial arts moves to ensure a successful mission. Master the different styles of all three Angels as you battle 32 different types of enemies across the globe. You can switch between characters at anytime during the game. Charlie's Angel's movie stars--Cameron Diaz, Lucy Liu, Drew Barrymore, and Bernie Mac--supply the voices.
